devdoc.author: Cooper Labs
devdoc.details: Generic contract for anyone to permissionlessly adjust the reserves of Angle ParallelizerThis contract is an authorized fork of Angle's GenericHarvester contract: https://github.com/AngleProtocol/angle-transmuter/blob/main/contracts/helpers/GenericHarvester.sol

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC-20 token failed.

AuthorityUpdated(address).details: Authority that manages this contract was updated.

params.amount: amount of tokenP to add to the budget

params.yieldBearingAsset: address of the yield bearing asset

returns.increase: whether the exposure should be increased

harvest(address,uint256,bytes).details: This transaction either reduces the exposure to `yieldBearingAsset` in the Parallelizer or frees up some yieldBearingAsset that can then be used for people looking to burn deposit tokensDue to potential transaction fees within the Parallelizer, this function doesn't exactly bring `yieldBearingAsset` to the target exposurescale is a number between 0 and 1e9 that represents the proportion of the tokenP to harvest, it is used to lower the amount of the asset to harvest for example to have a lower slippage

isConsumingScheduledOp().details: Returns true only in the context of a delayed restricted call, at the moment that the scheduled operation is being consumed. Prevents denial of service for delayed restricted calls in the case that the contract performs attacker controlled calls.

params.data: Arbitrary data structure, intended to contain user-defined parameters.
params.fee: The additional amount of tokens to repay.

params.to: address to send the recovered tokens
params.tokenAddress: address of the token to recover

params.amount: amount of tokenP to remove from the budget

setAuthority(address).details: Transfers control to a new authority. The caller must be the current authority.

params.targetExposure: target exposure to the yield bearing asset used
params.yieldBearingAsset: address of the yield bearing asset

params.newTokenTransferAddress: address of the token transfer contract

params.maxExposure: maximum exposure within the Parallelizer to the asset
params.minExposure: minimum exposure within the Parallelizer to the asset
params.overrideExposures: whether limit exposures should be overriden or read onchain through the Parallelizer
params.targetExposure: target exposure to the yieldBearingAsset asset used

params.trusted: address to toggle the trusted status

params.yieldBearingAsset: address of the yield bearing asset

devdoc.title: GenericHarvester

SwapRouterUpdated(address).notice: Event emitted when the swap router is updated

TokenTransferAddressUpdated(address).notice: Event emitted when the token proxy is updated

addBudget(uint256,address).notice: Add budget to be spent by the receiver during the flashloan

budget(address).notice: Budget of tokenP available for each users

computeRebalanceAmount(address).notice: Compute the amount needed to rebalance the Parallelizer

harvest(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Invests or divests from the yield asset associated to `yieldBearingAsset` based on the current exposure  to this yieldBearingAsset

isTrusted(address).notice: trusted addresses that can update target exposure and do others non critical operations

maxTokenSlippage(address).notice: Max slippage when dealing with the Parallelizer

parallelizer().notice: Reference to the `parallelizer` implementation this contract aims at rebalancing

removeBudget(uint256,address).notice: Remove budget from the owner and send it to the receiver

setTargetExposure(address,uint64).notice: Set the target exposure of a yield bearing asset

toggleTrusted(address).notice: Toggle the trusted status of an address

tokenP().notice: TokenP handled by the `parallelizer` of interest

tokenTransferAddress().notice: address to approve to transfer tokens to

updateLimitExposuresYieldAsset(address).notice: Set the limit exposures to the asset linked to the yield bearing asset

yieldBearingData(address).notice: Data associated to a yield bearing asset
